Player History
Drafted in 20th round, 317th overall pick, by Chicago in 2015...
Injured on 5/19/2015 with a Broken Cheekbone, out for 6 weeks...
Injured on 7/9/2017 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 9/1/2017 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Traded from Chicago to New York on 2/15/2018 (Going to NY: 2B Grant Dear. Going to CHI: P Andrew Battle, C Gregory Menges, P Mario Thibodeau)...
Traded from New York to Detroit on 3/2/2018 (Going to DET: P Tony Delrosario, 2B Grant Dear, 1B Gregory Lovato, P Leonard Howland. Going to NY: 2B Raymond Yasutoki)...
Had first career hit on 4/2/2018, off Kevin Kunio (ATL)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/7/2018, off Carey Secrest (COL)...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/19/2018, hitting .481 with 1 HR, 7 RBI...
Had 24-game hitting streak snapped on 9/2/2020...
1/31/2021: Gets a new one-year contract worth $635,714 through salary arbitration...
